title: What is this typeface?
content:
I need to re-create this logo, but cant figure out what the font of ’B Fit’ is.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090508103455im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tf_BFIT_5665.jpg)
author: kdbakker

comments.content: Fit is in [Rapier](http://web.archive.org/web/20090508103455/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/rapier_std_plain/?&sample_text=Fit&sample_size=96) and the B might be lettered by hand.
The B is Palette as Akira [pointed out](http://web.archive.org/web/20090508103455/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/viewthread.php?threadid=194828).
